dt: {bc}either of two biennial herbs of the mustard family with thick edible roots:
{bc}one ({it}Brassica rapa rapifera{/it}) with globular often flattened roots and leaves that are cooked as a vegetable

et: Middle English {it}turnepe{/it}, probably from {it}turnen{/it} to turn + {it}nepe{/it} neep; from the well-rounded root
shortdef: either of two biennial herbs of the mustard family with thick edible roots:
one (Brassica rapa rapifera) with globular often flattened roots and leaves that are cooked as a vegetable
